text.more:
The goals of prototype application are to, 
• Help expose the connections within the the open data sources via visual network map.
• Enable exploration of relationships between entities and assist identification of key players via an interactive GUI that can be deployed to production.
• Design a prototype which can be used as a model for potential future development projects.
• Develop a model that can be used as an analytical tool to provide supports in the research of the Government Transparency as whole.
text.intro:
This Network Map is a prototype application developed by team Neural Nerds at UTS (iLab2) in partnership with the Australian Research Data Commons (ARDC) and University of Melbourne – Centre for Health Policy.

The label consists of [the total amount] Entiry Name - [Entity Type]

The size of node (circle) represents the total donation amount where applicable which helps identify key donors. (Equals 1 where the donation amount is not applicable).

Options available in the Group Selector represent entity types.
Group 1 – Lobbying Firm
Group 2 - Corporation
Group 3 - Individual
Group 4 - Agent for state candidate
Group 5 - Lobbyist
Group 6 - Other
Group 7 – Trust/Foundation
Group 8 – State Candidate
Group 9 – Unincorporated Association
text.title: Government Transparency
